review: An under-rated film.It maintains suspense till the very end as everyone thinks that the antagonist(serial killer) is going to kill the singer but something else end up happening due to the mistake made by the cop earlier in the story.Even though he is killed at the end by the cop but he still wins as he is able to convince her to kill him.Overall, a must watch movie.

One of the very few true thrillers of bollywood. The best thing about this movie is it revolves arround the main storyline without any unnecessary songs/character's personal life plot, however the climax is somewhat influenced by Se7en(1996)
I'm surprised why I've never heard of this movie. Taut storyline, excellent direction & sublime acting..... Recipe for one of the best crime thrillers in bollywood !!!
Good suspense and story which creates thrill while movie goes on. But during the climax , it is already realised that suspect must be jackie shraff, as he never appeared in story before.
What a suspense & thriller movie.. Incredible. I don't know how it missed. Jackie Shroff's chilling performance. Story line, exact ingredients. Overall great movie.
One of the most underrated movies to be made in bollywood..  a damn good thriller with an excellent cast
A very good suspense thriller on the line of Seven (1995). Keeps you engaged and at the edge of the seat.
Awesome movie. I recommend it if you are interested to watch suspense+mystery+investigative movie. 5/5
